misc.author: orion
misc.post: My friend, to begin with Carl Jung died in 1961. No way he could have commented on the 2005 death of Pope John Paul II. Also, what’s wrong with a Romanian TV news reporting on the UFO? Did you ever see UFOs on CNN, NBC or ABC? No, and you will never see Wolf Blitz reporting on any of the thousand of valid UFO images we have because they are not allowed to.
misc.title: I Wish These People Had Never Heard of the Shroud of Turin
